item.title: ADEM-VL: Adaptive and Embedded Fusion for Efficient Vision-Language Tuning
item.description: ADEM-VL: A novel vision-language tuning framework achieves state-of-the-art accuracy with significantly reduced computational cost and parameters, using a parameter-free cross-attention mechanism and …

item.title: Asynchronous RLHF: Faster and More Efficient Off-Policy RL for Language Models
item.description: Asynchronous RLHF accelerates language model training by 40% with improved efficiency, matching the performance of synchronous methods.

item.title: DynamicCity: Large-Scale LiDAR Generation from Dynamic Scenes
item.description: DynamicCity generates large-scale, high-quality 4D LiDAR scenes capturing dynamic environments, improving autonomous driving system development.

item.title: Lightweight Neural App Control
item.description: LiMAC, a lightweight neural app control architecture, uses a hybrid approach combining a small Action Transformer with a fine-tuned vision-language model for precise, real-time mobile app control, out…

item.title: MIA-DPO: Multi-Image Augmented Direct Preference Optimization For Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: MIA-DPO boosts large vision-language model performance on multi-image tasks by cleverly augmenting single-image data and using attention mechanisms to filter out inaccurate responses.

item.title: Multi-Draft Speculative Sampling: Canonical Architectures and Theoretical Limits
item.description: Researchers boosted Large Language Model inference speed by using multiple draft models and a novel token selection scheme, improving block efficiency and token rates.

item.title: Scalable Ranked Preference Optimization for Text-to-Image Generation
item.description: Researchers created a scalable method for aligning text-to-image models using synthetic preference datasets and a novel ranking-based optimization, significantly improving image quality and prompt-fol…

item.title: Scaling Diffusion Language Models via Adaptation from Autoregressive Models
item.description: Researchers efficiently adapt large autoregressive language models into competitive diffusion language models, overcoming previous scalability challenges and demonstrating improved performance on vari…

item.title: TP-Eval: Tap Multimodal LLMs' Potential in Evaluation by Customizing Prompts
item.description: TP-Eval unveils the hidden potential of MLLMs by customizing prompts to mitigate evaluation bias caused by prompt sensitivity, leading to a more accurate assessment of model capabilities.

item.title: Value Residual Learning For Alleviating Attention Concentration In Transformers
item.description: ResFormer & SVFormer alleviate Transformer attention concentration, boosting performance and reducing memory needs, paving the way for more efficient large language models.

item.title: WorldSimBench: Towards Video Generation Models as World Simulators
item.description: WorldSimBench: A new benchmark rigorously evaluates video generation models’ ability to simulate realistic, actionable videos, advancing embodied AI.

item.title: ZIP-FIT: Embedding-Free Data Selection via Compression-Based Alignment
item.description: ZIP-FIT: a novel data selection method uses gzip compression to efficiently identify task-relevant data, significantly boosting model performance and reducing training time.
